entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers or light snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
